name: Good vacation
description:
It is rather short and easy stuffing and weight gaining game. Every version of my games may be completely different and those, who liked it may dislike the next. So I create different games, not updationg them. If I will understand, that there is a way to improve the game, not ruining it, I'll do it) So please comment what you definitely want to add to the game, and I'll update it.

If you are my patron, you already have the latest version and no need to buy it.
